00029 typedef enum {
00030     bson_eoo=0 ,
00031     bson_double=1,

00049 } bson_type;

00051 typedef int bson_bool_t;

00053 typedef struct {
00054     char * data;
00055     bson_bool_t owned;
00056 } bson;

00058 typedef struct {
00059     const char * cur;
00060     bson_bool_t first;
00061 } bson_iterator;
00062 
00063 typedef struct {
00064     char * buf;
00065     char * cur;
00066     int bufSize;
00067     bson_bool_t finished;
00068     int stack[32];
00069     int stackPos;
00070 } bson_buffer;

00075     int ints[3];

00081 typedef struct {
00082   int i; /* increment */
